Description: 
------------ 
This is the update of the Original Multi XP OEM System Builders multi aÃƒÆ’Ã‚Â±adidos.La some manufacturers installation is in English but includes MUI to pass into Spanish. 

The other manufacturers are as follows:

Changes 

* Setup.ini changed and added to the BIOS files to i386 OEM (Dell BIOS files in i386) 
* Also added Winnt.sif with (Dell) OEM UnattendMode = ProvideDefaults key. 
* Slipstream SP3 integrated in text mode only MassStorage drivers version 9.01 
* Mass storage Driverpacks.net therefore supports SATA and RAID without a floppy drive. 
* No default features have been removed. 
* No other changes were made to the disk. 

The reason that this album was made because we could not find the version of a multi-system builder OEM XP online. All existing versions had several things added or removed. 

Strictly designed to reduce the need for technicians to maintain multiple copies of XP at all for the most common manufacturer who came to see as well as eliminate the need for F6 drivers in SATA drives.
